mapper.select: SELECT gm_user.`userid`,gm_user.`username`,gm_user.`password`, gm_user_role.`roleid`,gm_role.`rolename`,gm_role.`rolecode`,gm_role.`roledescription` FROM gm_user LEFT JOIN gm_user_role ON gm_user.`userid` = gm_user_role.userid LEFT JOIN gm_role ON gm_user_role.roleid = gm_role.`roleid` WHERE gm_user.`username`= #{username}
